description: Monitor executed commands and arguments containing indicators of obfuscation and known suspicious syntax such as uninterpreted escape characters like '''^''' and '''"'''. Deobfuscation tools can be used to detect these indicators in files/payloads. (Citation: GitHub Revoke-Obfuscation) (Citation: FireEye Revoke-Obfuscation July 2017) (Citation: GitHub Office-Crackros Aug 2016)

external_references.description: Bohannon, D. (2017, July 27). Revoke-Obfuscation. Retrieved February 12, 2018.
Bohannon, D. & Holmes, L. (2017, July 27). Revoke-Obfuscation: PowerShell Obfuscation Detection Using Science. Retrieved February 12, 2018.
Carr, N. (2016, August 14). OfficeCrackros. Retrieved February 12, 2018.
